thread.section_title: Hot Football Tickets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hot Football Tickets | www.hotfootballtickets.com
thread.title: Kasia Konwinska
thread.title_full: Hot Football Tickets reviewed by Kasia Konwinska

author: Kasia Konwinska
title: Kasia Konwinska
text:
I have bought tickets few times on this website and each time it was awful experience. Customer service is disgusting and did not even let you finish what you want to say or explain !! 5 stars are definitely fake reviews !
Please please avoid.
